price: Na hakika tulikwisha andika katika Zaburi baada ya Kumbukumbu, ya kwamba nchi watairithi waja wangu walio wema.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ كَتَبۡنَا فِي ٱلزَّبُورِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ٱلذِّكۡرِ أَنَّ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ يَرِثُهَا عِبَادِيَ ٱلصَّٰلِحُونَ
footnotes: Na tulikwisha andika katika Zaburi - nacho ni Kitabu cha Daud baada ya Taurati - kwamba nchi watairithi waja wangu walio wema wapate kuitengeza, na kusahilisha njia za maisha bora humo. ("Bali wenye upole watairithi nchi"..Zaburi 37.11 "Wenye haki watairithi nchi, nao watakaa humo milele".. Zaburi 37.29)

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walaqad katabnā fī al-zabūri min baʿdi al-dhik'ri anna al-arḍa yarithuhā ʿibādiya al-ṣāliḥūna
